headline: Xcel Energy Raises Dividend Amid Strong Growth and Expanding Power Demand
summary: Xcel Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:XEL) announced on May 21 that its Board of Directors approved a quarterly dividend of 57 cents per share. This is a 4.1% increase from the previous amount, 54.75 cents. The hike marks Xcel Energy’s 22nd consecutive year of dividend increases. CEO Bob Frenzel stated that the increase reflects the board’s confidence in […]

headline: Todd Hancock named senior director of Xcel Energy's Harrington and Nichols Complex
